resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73271</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b02a2a01-c5fc-48c9-8227-604ec5abbd2a#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Bükkerdő rajza</string>
            <string language="en">Beech-wood's drawing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung des Buche-Holzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le schéma du Hêtre-bo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenho da Beech-madeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustrazione del Faggio-legno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο οξιά-ξύλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gráfico de la Haya-madera</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A bükkerdőben a fák sűrűbben állnak, ezért az erdő aljára kevesebb fény jut. Emiatt nem alakult ki cserjeszint és a gyepszint is szegényes.</string>
            <string language="en">In the beech-wood trees stand closer, therefore less light arrive at the bottom of the forest. This is the reason why shrub stratum didn't formed and the lawn stratum is also poor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">bükkerdő,  szintezettség,  mintázat,  aljnövényzet,  hagymások,  </string>
            <string language="en">beech-wood, levelling, pattern, undergrowth, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Buche-Holz stehen die Bäume nahe, folglich 
kommen weniger Licht zu der Unterseite des Waldes. Dieses ist 
der Grund, warum Strauchschicht nicht gebildet und die Rasenschicht 
auch Armen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En hêtre-bois les arbres se tiennent plus 
étroitement, donc moins de lumière arrivent au bas de la forêt. 
C'est la raison pour laquelle la strate d'arbuste  non formé et
la strate de pelouse est également des pauvres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na beech-madeira as árvores estão mais perto, 
conseqüentemente menos luz chega no fundo da floresta. Esta é 
a razão porque o stratum do shrub  não dado forma e o stratum do 
gramado é também pobres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In faggio-legno gli alberi si levano in piedi più 
vicino, quindi meno luce arriva alla parte inferiore della foresta. 
Ciò è la ragione per la quale lo strato dell'arbusto non 
formato e lo strato del prato è egualmente povero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη στάση δέντρων οξιά-ξύλου πιό κοντά, επομένως το
λιγότερο φως φθάνει στο κατώτατο σημείο του δάσους. Αυτό 
είναι ο λόγος για τον οποίο το στρώμα θάμνων μην διαμορφωμένος 
και το στρώμα χορτοταπήτων είναι επίσης φτωχό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En haya-madera los árboles están parados más 
cerca, por lo tanto menos luz llega el fondo del bosque. Ésta 
es la razón por la que lo hizo el estrato del arbusto no formado y el
estrato del césped es también pobres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buche-Holz, ebnend, Muster, Undergrowth, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hêtre-bois, nivelant, configuration, broussaille, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">beech-madeira, nivelando, teste padrão, undergrowth, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">faggio-legno, livellante, modello, sottobosco, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξιά-ξύλινος, ισοπέδωση, πρότυπο, χαμόκλαδο, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">haya-madera, nivelando, modelo, maleza, bulbouses</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>

              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
